item.title: [DISTRELEC-3174] HMC access for AT
item.description:
Please add the AT Distrelec IP range to the HMC access:

10.194.0.X

comments.comment:
Hello Florian

Since AT cannot access via. the internel IP 10.191.20.140,
I need the public ip from Austria.

On 10 Feb 2014, at 09:31, Buehler, Florian <florian.buehler@distrelec.com> wrote:

Dies habe ich von einem Mitarbeiter in AT über What’s my IP bekommen J
 
192.204.70.3

Order Deny,Allow
Deny from all
Satisfy Any
Allow from 195.141.49.26 192.204.70.3

From AT you can access the HMC via:
https://www.distrelec.at/hmc/hybris
Access is only allowed from AT and only via. SSL (https://...).
The correct address ist: 194.204.70.3

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3190] Allow invoices issue
item.description:
The customer configuration "allow invoice" is not working correctly.
True = customer is not able to use invoice as payment methode
False = customer able use invoice as payment methode

Logic should be the other way around.

Workaround for today: All customers configuration has been set on false

Solution:

  • Please fix the code
  • Set configuraiton for all customers on "true"
  • Import full movex customer export into Hybris.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3189] Newline in Movex order file
item.description: If a customer uses new lines in the comment field of the check out review page the new lines will also be added into the movex order file (header.log).

comments.comment: Like discussed on the phone, we will replace the newlines with spaces.

Please modify the following attributes on top of this task:

"orderExport.costcenter:" to "Costcenter:"
"orderExport.projectNumber:" to "Projectnumber "
Adjustment done for costcenter and projectnumber

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3180] Google Analytics issue
item.description:
Google scheint etwas am E-Commerce Tracking geändert zu haben

fand soeben code-unterschiede beim senden-befehl:
live:
ga('send', 'ecommerce'); // Send transaction and item data to Google Analytics.

gemäss anleitung müsste es so sein:
ga('ecommerce:send'); // Send transaction and item data to Google Analytics.

comments.comment: Fehler ist behoben. Daniel prüft es gerade auf dem Q und wenn alles passt geht es per dirty fix aufs P

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3172] Error 500 during check out
item.description:
A migrated user in AT is trying to check out after login.

User: bibiana

https://www.distrelec.at/checkout/address

comments.comment:
10 Feb 2014 08:16:26 ERROR [hybrisHTTP33] [10.191.16.13] [error_page_log] a technical error occured [uuid: 12469bb8-3ac7-4853-8ce2-5333ad4ad132].
de.hybris.platform.servicelayer.exceptions.ModelNotFoundException: No result for the given query
at de.hybris.platform.servicelayer.search.impl.DefaultFlexibleSearchService.searchUnique(DefaultFlexibleSearchService.java:242)
at com.namics.distrelec.erpabstraction.inout.erp.impl.MovexPaymentOptionService.getAbstractDistPaymentModeForErpPaymentModeCode(MovexPaymentOptionService.java:201)
at com.namics.distrelec.erpabstraction.inout.erp.impl.MovexPaymentOptionService.setDefaultPaymentModeToCart(MovexPaymentOptionService.java:400)
at com.namics.distrelec.erpabstraction.inout.erp.impl.MovexPaymentOptionService.getSupportedPaymentOptions(MovexPaymentOptionService.java:128)
at com.namics.distrelec.erpabstraction.inout.erp.impl.RoutingPaymentOptionService.getSupportedPaymentOptions(RoutingPaymentOptionService.java:26)
at com.namics.distrelec.erpabstraction.inout.erp.impl.MovexOrderCalculationService.calculate(MovexOrderCalculationService.java:48)
at com.namics.distrelec.erpabstraction.inout.erp.impl.RoutingOrderCalculationService.calculate(RoutingOrderCalculationService.java:23)
at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.facades.order.checkout.impl.DefaultDistCheckoutFacade.calculateOrder(DefaultDistCheckoutFacade.java:351)
at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.storefront.controllers.pages.checkout.AbstractDistCheckoutController.calculateCart(AbstractDistCheckoutController.java:72)
at sun.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor1516.invoke(Unknown Source)
at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:606)
final AbstractDistPaymentModeModel paymentMode = getAbstractDistPaymentModeForErpPaymentModeCode(movexCustomer.getDefaultPaymentMethod());

Ich habe unter:
Zahlungs- und Zustellungsoptionen die Standard-Einstellungen gesetzt, jetzt kommt die Exception nicht mehr.

P_DEFAULTPAYMENTMETHOD COUNT(*)
 ------------------------- -----------
 (null) 10137
 20 1197
 001 10
 020 1
 30 1

update movexcustomer set P_DEFAULTPAYMENTMETHOD = '020'
where P_DEFAULTPAYMENTMETHOD ='20'

Zudem habe ich den cache geleert.

P_DEFAULTPAYMENTMETHOD COUNT(*)
 ------------------------- -----------
 (null) 10139
 020 1199
 001 10
The default payment type from the customer migration was set to "20" instead "020".

Hi,

I already fixed the problem in the Customer migration script. We need to update the default payment method of the movex customer using direct SQL as René mentioned in previous comment.

Nabil.
The customer migration script is already updated.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3153] Filtering - level 3 contains 2 PLs and there is a useless Weitere Anzeigen button
item.description:
The level 3 just contains 2 sub-levels (2 Product lines).
The Weitere Anzeigen button should not be displayed.
Example :
Werkzeuge & Messtechnik / Löten / Dosiersysteme

See screenshot
item.summary: Filtering - level 3 contains 2 PLs and there is a useless Weitere Anzeigen button

comments.comment:
Indeed.
"Weitere anzeigen" should only show if there are actually more categories.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3088] Availability Definition AT
item.description:
Ich reviewe gerade die Availability-Logik im neuen Shop vorerst mal für AT. Im neuen Shop wurde die Logik soweit ich weiss mit dem Grundgedanken des Central-Warehouse in NL entwickelt. Mit der nun neu eingeführten Definition im aktuellen Shop entstehen nun schlechtere Lieferzeitangaben, obwohl bessere geleistet werden könnten - auch wenn das Inter-Company-Shipping nicht per Express ausgeführt wird.

Neue Definition: Artikel an Lager im Primary Warehouse des jeweiligen Landes werden mit 24h Lieferfrist ausgegeben, alles andere mit Lieferfrist innerhalb 10 Tagen.

Beispiel:
Wenn ein Artikel z.B. nur in DE an Lager ist, würde anhand der neuen Definition in AT dann „innert 10 Tagen" angezeigt werden (Dasselbe wie in Slowenien und in diesem Fall ginge der Artikel sogar über AT). Dies macht für mich irgendwie wenig Sinn.

Logik aktuell im neuen Shop(AT)

  • Von CH-Warehouse(600325): 24h
  • Von DE-Warehouse(602318): 48h
  • Von SE-Warehouse(604587): 48h

Logik anhand der neuen Spezifikation im Neuen Shop(AT)

  • Von CH-Warehouse: 24h
  • Von DE-Warehouse: innert 10 Tagen
  • Von SE-Warehouse: innert 10 Tagen

Hier müsste die Logistik genau prüfen, welche Fristen eingehalten werden können. Ich denke ein so allgemeine Definition(10d) macht wenig Sinn. Danke.

comments.comment:
Hallo Nando,

I won't be able to look at this into detail today. Could you please discuss it with Rafael B. and Florian. Thx.

The label for 48h is maintained as a property (there are multiple: product list, detail page, info layer on detail page, possibly more).
It can be adapted -> text issue.
Please note that no more than approx. 5 characters are available on most places (an exception being the info layer on the detail page).

Please advise Oana / Nabil if a change needs to be done, before today's deployment.

Note:
those properties can currently NOT be maintained per site (country). If this is changed for AT and a different label is needes for any other country, a follow-up CR needs to be created to adapt the handling and logic of this.

The availability Logic distinguishes between the following conditions(AT-specific):
- Primary Warehouse(CH): 24h
- Secondary Warehouses(SE, DE): 48h
- Not on stock: >48h

Now those texts have to change into this:
- Primary Warehouse(CH): 24h
- Secondary Warehouses(SE, DE): <10 d
- Not on stock: >10 d

On the following sites:
- Productdetail(including availability-detail overlay)
- Compare
- Lists(Search result)
  - Shopping List
  - Cart
  - Favorite
i attaached the diff from nabil

Rafael, one state is missing in your description. Currently we have four states:

green 24h
light green 48h
yellow 48h
orange 48h

Should we change it into this?

green 24h
light green 48h
yellow < 10d
orange > 10d

green 24h
light green 48h
yellow 48h < 10d
orange 48h > 10d

Is correct.
Thank you Florian, we changed the colored Dots and the Availability Popover accordingly.

Is not changed yet.
The fly out information is correct but not the properties on the detailpage etc.

We have few errors in the status:
- Icon shows 48h but flyout displays <10d
- Icon shows <10d but flyout displays >10d
- There is an old date written with the label 10d in the flyout

To test: Search for Sonos Play 1 and you'll get 3 different status and article 711356
@Rafael Burlet: Check the mobile version which is not aligned at all.
Sevenval ist dran.

Verifying whether the states for AT were specified correctly.
Updated spec here https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/C35-ShippingInformation

There was a misunderstanding with the states above. Here is what they need to be for AT (applies to product list and product detail page):

green => "24 h"
light green => "< 10 d"
yellow => "> 10 d"
orange => "> 10 d"

Note: the display in the AT info layer available on the detail page is correct as it is.
Commited change to 1.0 Branch. Changed Labels according to spec.
Rafael, maybe Sevenwall needs to update these too.
Sevenval will set the changes live by tomorrow

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3001] Feedback Form - red text
item.description:
Please make the Red writting from this page, Black. http://test.distrelec.at/de//cms/feedback

Thanks!

comments.comment: Why is this due only on the 6th?

Hi All,

Since the text in question is within a Content Slot editable within the cms cockpit, the text needs to be changed there. Although, the H3 Title Color is always red, so either change the text to normal Text or then we have to discuss what we could do.

Hi Jan!

this page: Distrelec Content Catalog AT >> Staged >> Feedback Page - DIS-S

has only a header component. No text component.

Please indicate where is the page that has the editable text. Maybe I am on the wrong page.
Thanks!

Hi Oana,

My bad, indeed the text is within the "hardcoded" Form Part of the page. I adjusted the color of the text block. Is it ok to leave the text in that size? (Just because we leave from the convention here, to have H3 Elements with red color..?)
please make this regular paragraph, regular text size. thanks!

Hi Oana,

adjusted it accordingly, see printscreen

This is not fixed:

http://test.distrelec.at/de//cms/feedback
http://prod.distrelec.at.distrelec.com/de//cms/feedback
It's part of R1.1
